segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, and she looks so focused on what she's doing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the water overflowing from the sink, creating a huge puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't even seem to notice the mess she's standing in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is being very brave, climbing on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching for the cookie jar, and I hope he doesn't fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so excited, waiting for a cookie from her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will notice the children's mischief before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside the window looks so calm and tidy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman realizes the water overflow before someone slips and gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how oblivious she is to everything happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR
